info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cavalier, northwestern Nelson, east central Ramsey, western Walsh and Pembina Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hamilton to near Brocket. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park River, Cavalier, Lakota, Neche, St. Thomas, Hoople and Edinburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
